title: Framework gotcha: Lexical update() vs read() return asymmetry
trigger: When TypeScript error 'expression of type void cannot be tested' appears during framework refactoring

signals.api_asymmetry: editor.read() returns callback value, editor.update() returns void
signals.type_error: expression of type void cannot be tested for truthiness
signals.mutation_vs_query: update() is for side effects, read() is for data extraction
signals.refactor_failure: Attempt to simplify code by returning from update() callback failed
